text: Al-Nabk is a town in Syria. It is located to the North of Damascus, the capital. It takes about 90 minutes by car from the main international Airport. The population is about forty thousand people. The weather is very cold and snowy in winter because Al-Nabk lies on high mountains. It is about 1360 meter above the sea level. However, in summer the weather is very nice and warm. It is a place for spending happy holidays. Category:Geography of Syria
title: Al-Nabk District
